Class ResourceInspector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.datacenter.software.admissioncontroller.ResourceInspector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.ComponentI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdapterComponent, AdapterRequestDispatcher, AdmissionController, AdmissionControllerComponent

    public class ResourceInspector
extends fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent

    Description

    this component ResourceInspector interacts with the DataProvider to request availability of resources in the DataCenter, he can inspects the abstract values of performances stored

    2017.12.10.HK
    Author:
    Hacene KASDI
